Name: High School Simulator 2017
Description:
Sequel of High School Simulator GirlA
Please enjoy the Japanese high school life

Name: Pretend My High School
Description: Pretend my high school is open ended role play game with a lot fun and entertaining activities. Pretend play game as you like and explore all the open world creative activities in amazing game play. Do you like to have fun play time in high school? Do you love music, art, playground and eating food in food court cafeteria? Well in this pretend my high school games you can play your dream. Enjoy in music room, eat food in cafeteria, explore art class and many more.

Name: High School Bus Parking & Driving Test - 2K16 Extreme simulator 3d Edition
Description:
*^*^*^* High School Bus Parking & Driving Test *^*^*^*

You had have fun car races or bike racing 3D games in your device, we invite you to get some new and extreme driving experience. Drive heavy duty school buses in busy streets of the city. Get some real time experience while driving heavy vehicles?
Let’s have some crazy fun and drive a big yellow School Bus! This game will make you sit in the front seat of a School bus and let you maneuver around the road. Sounds fun right? Steer the big bus, push on the pedal and drive your way around the city.

Features:
-It’s absolutely FREE on ios app store !
-Time base challenge finish tasks before time ends.
-Smooth and simple screen controls to drive bus easily.
-Realistic and amazing 3D graphics.
-Smooth controls and fun gameplay. 
-Superb background music to enhance your game plays experience.

Name: DeSoto County High School
Description: We are pleased to announce the release of our new mobile school APP.  Download our app to stay connected with our school. Receive up to date notifications, athletic schedules, special events, field trips, contact school employees, visit our photo gallery and much more.   The APP is free for everyone.

Name: High School Escape
Description:
High School Escape 2 - Out Now!

Hey, freshman! 
Are you ready to escape through the locked campus? 
This escape game takes you back to the high school but this time you are trapped. Prove you skills in code-breaking, puzzle solving and logical thinking! Because no one wants to be locked down in the school. So use all the escaping skills you have to break out!

Are you ready to escape through campus, trophy room, chemistry class and many others?

Game features:
- Back to school atmosphere!
- Scientific puzzles!
- Amazing graphics!
- Classical room escape game!
